Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Avatar Boulevard, east of a rather smelly marsh.
Room.LongDescription: The river which flows into Lyanden Lake leaves behind a small marsh of mud and quicksand in the region to the west, which really starts to smell after a long day in the hot sun. This is not necessarily good for the businesses that have to work here. There is a large complex to the east which houses a number of shops.
